description:
Sasaki is a middle-aged office worker living in Japan. Feeling drained by the vapid corporate world, he heads to the pet shop in search of a new companion. There he finds an adorable bird named Peeps and takes him home. But Sasaki quickly learns that Peeps isn’t your average bird…he’s a powerful mage from another world! Together, they embark on a magical adventure filled with swords and sorcery.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~48 minutes.
synonyms: ซาซากิกับพีจัง

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Crossover
tags.description: Centers around the placement of two or more otherwise discrete fictional characters, settings, or universes into the context of a single story.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

title.native: 佐々木とピーちゃん 第２期

node.description:
__Currently living:__ Saitama Prefecture, Japan

Kantoku is an illustrator, artist, and key illustrator born March 26, 1985. He established, and is currently active in his own circle, 5nen me no Houkago (5年目の放課後, lit. 5th Year's After School). 

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kantoku_5th) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1565632) | [Circle](http://5-y.2-d.jp/)

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

An art director affiliated with Studio Tulip.

_Note: Not to be confused with [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/103341/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MADKID_official)

MADKID (マッドキッド), formerly known as J-BOYS-5, is a Japanese vocal and dance boy group formed on July 20, 2014. Currently, they consist of 3 vocals and 2 rappers.
In 2018 they made their major-label debut under Nippon Columbia.

Current Members:
* [YOU-TA (ゆーた)](https://anilist.co/staff/270066/YOUTA) (Leader; joined September 2014)
* KAZUKI (かずき)
* SHIN (しん) (Joined February 1, 2017)
* [LIN (りん)](https://anilist.co/staff/270067/LIN)
* [YUKI (ゆき)](https://anilist.co/staff/270070/YUKI)

Former Members:
* KENTO (Leader; left September 2014; now member of IVVY as KENTO.i)
* RIKITO (Left May 2015)
* CASEY (Joined in summer 2015, left January 2016)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/LIN_MDKD)

LIN is a member of the boy group [MADKID](https://anilist.co/staff/224693/MADKID).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YUKI_MDKD)

YUKI is a member of the boy group [MADKID](https://anilist.co/staff/224693/MADKID).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ucca23) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uccalaugh/)

Singer and songwriter based in Tokyo.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [composite artist](https://anilist.co/staff/180832/Daisuke-Inoue)._
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.

[Website](https://www.mattgreenbaumvo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mattsgreenbaum) 

American voice actor and ADR writer.
